name: Noah Huppert
body:
#About Me My name is Noah Huppert. I am currently a high school student. I enjoy programming and the challenges that come with it. When asked if I know a programming language chances are the answer is going to be "yes" or "sorta". I am most familiar (in no particular order) with Java, C, C++, C#, Javascript, HTML, CSS, SCSS, SASS, Python, Ruby, and PHP. However with a healthy amount of Googling and confusing myself I can learn a language if needed(Latest example Ruby). #Contact Me If you wish to get in contact for any reason please email `noah.programmer AT gmail DOT com`(Replace AT and DOT with the correct characters, this is to prevent spam) #Projects ##Super Blocks Super Blocks is a learning game that is meant to help children with basic math skills. Super Blocks is still in development but is getting very close to release. Super Blocks uses [Unity 3D](http://unity3d.com/) and C#. ##[Download Super Blocks Pre Release](https://github.com/Noah-Huppert/Super-Blocks/releases/tag/v1.0)
##First Robotics League I currently partipcate in the First Robotics League via a school club. I am the lead programmer of the robot at this time. [Source Code](https://github.com/Noah-Huppert/LSRHSRobotics)
##Motion Controller Marionettes In 2013 I displayed a demo at Maker Faire called "Motion Controller Marionettes". These demo used the [Leap Motion](https://www.leapmotion.com/) to determine where the users hand was positioned and control a virtual puppet accordingly #Languages - English - Java - C - C++ - C# - Javascript - HTML - CSS - SCSS - SASS - Python - Ruby - PHP
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
